home.title: Web Tools Collection
home.subtitle: Use various tools for web development and design in one place. All processing is done in the browser and files are not sent to the server.

image.title: Image Optimizer
image.description: Provides image compression, WebP conversion, and resizing features

font.title: Font Preview & Converter
font.description: Preview web fonts and convert to various formats (WOFF, TTF)

json.title: JSON Formatter & Viewer
json.description: A tool to format and edit JSON

api.title: API Tester
api.description: API testing tool based on Fetch or Axios

base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: A tool to encode and decode text and files to Base64

tailwind.title: CSS â†’ Tailwind Converter
tailwind.description: A tool to convert CSS code to Tailwind CSS classes

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.description: A tool to convert text or URL to QR code and download

timestamp.title: Timestamp Converter
timestamp.description: A tool to convert between Unix timestamp and date/time format

codeplayground.title: Code Playground
codeplayground.description: A tool to test and preview HTML, CSS, React code in real-time

sql.title: SQL Query Formatter
sql.description: A tool to format and organize SQL queries
sql.inputDescription: Enter the SQL query to format
sql.inputPlaceholder: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1 AND name LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
sql.outputDescription: Formatted result will be displayed here
sql.emptyState: Formatted SQL will be displayed here
sql.exampleDescription: You can format SQL queries like these

xml.title: XML Formatter
xml.description: A tool to format and organize XML
xml.inputDescription: Enter the XML code to format
xml.outputDescription: Formatted result will be displayed here
xml.emptyState: Formatted XML will be displayed here
xml.exampleDescription: You can format XML code like this

signature.title: Signature Generator
signature.description: A tool to generate and download digital signatures
signature.cardDescription: Draw your signature below and download it
signature.instruction: Draw your signature above using mouse or touch. Saved with transparent background.

regex.title: Regex Pattern Matcher
regex.description: A tool to test regular expressions and check matching results
regex.pageDescription: Test regex patterns and view matching results

storage.title: Browser Storage Manager
storage.description: A tool to manage local storage and session storage, add, delete, and view data

keycode.title: KeyCode Tracker
keycode.description: Real-time keyboard input tracking and keycode information
keycode.pageDescription: Display information about the keyboard key you press
keycode.cardDescription: Click or tap the gray area below to focus, then press any key.
keycode.placeholderDescription: Information about the last pressed key will be displayed here.

querystring.title: URL Query String Parser & Builder
querystring.description: A tool to parse URL query strings or generate new query strings
querystring.pageDescription: Parse and build URL query strings

hash.title: Hash Generator
hash.description: Generate hash values for text or files. Supports MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512 algorithms
hash.pageDescription: Generate hash values for text or files

unit.title: CSS Unit Converter
unit.description: Quickly convert values of frequently used CSS properties

texttoimage.title: Text to Image Converter
texttoimage.description: A tool to convert text to image and apply various styles

wordcounter.title: Word & Character Counter
wordcounter.description: A tool to calculate the number of characters, words, sentences, and paragraphs in real-time
wordcounter.pageSubtitle: Analyze the number of characters, words, sentences, and paragraphs in real-time and calculate estimated reading time
wordcounter.placeholder: Enter or paste your text here...
helpItems: Character and word count are calculated in real-time
Sentences are separated by periods, exclamation marks, or question marks
Paragraphs are separated by blank lines

stockcalculator.title: Stock Averaging Down Calculator
stockcalculator.description: Calculate average purchase price and simulate profit/loss for multiple stock purchases
stockcalculator.pageDescription: Calculate average purchase price instantly and check profit/loss simulation
stockcalculator.purchaseDescription: Enter the purchase price and quantity for each transaction
stockcalculator.targetPriceDescription: Enter current price to view estimated profit/loss
stockcalculator.step1: Currency: Select Korean Won (â‚©) or US Dollar ($)
stockcalculator.step2: Purchase Price: Enter the purchase price for each transaction
stockcalculator.step3: Quantity: Enter the number of shares purchased at that price
stockcalculator.step4: Target Price: Enter current price to simulate profit/loss
stockcalculator.disclaimer: â€» All calculations are performed in your browser, and no data is sent to the server. Exchange rate information is provided by Frankfurter API. Investment decisions are your own responsibility.
